title: Karnataka: Muslim student assaulted for talking to Hindu girl, 4 held
selftext:
A Muslim student was assaulted by four Hindu men for talking to a Hindu girl at Puttur in Karnataka’s Dakshina Kannada district Tuesday. The police have arrested the four assailants.

17-year-old Mohammed Faris was at a juice parlour with his female classmates from the government pre-university college in Puttur.

Well done. I'm sure this hindu girl must now be smitten and all head over heels at the bravado and machismo of these alpha hindu men.
Rumor is her parents are arranging for her to be married with one of the men now.
Sorry it wasn't obvious to me - I've come across too many mind-numbing news from India that it wouldn't surprise me much if this was actually true
